page.title: 19LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: North Hykeham Town Councilwith 19 councillors has many projects under consideration.Most of the projects depend on money being made available. There is deliberation in council meetings before any money is spent. Fifteen new litter bins are to be put up around the town and new signposts are also being provided. This year twelve thousand pounds has been spent on street lighting. A new adventure playground is being planned,but of course,safety is a great consideration,meaning long discussion of all aspects. This playground is to be erected on the Witham Fields. Trees are being planted in the park and footpaths are being signposted. 1985 is theYear of the Youth and many different events are being organised.
